channel.title: Need help 317
channel.description: Hi im trying to start a new private server, the source base is phonescape, and i want to fix mass clicking, duping, and add real moving water, teleports, ::pure command, and the non lag out when right clicking things. please help

item.title: Need help 317
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

whats the point of

addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(0, 5); ?

and

daniel14:

Hi im trying to start a new private server, the source base is phonescape, and i want to fix mass clicking, duping, and add real moving water, teleports, ::pure command, and the non lag out when right clicking things. please help

almost every server has these things download a source and rip it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help 317
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

these questions are basic stuff.

Well, real moving water makes some lag but here you go;
Client sided in
Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3
Under method371(int i):

if (i == 1) { i = 24; }

I’m not exactly sure about the pure command but it’s something like:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }

Inefficient code is inefficient

Read full topic

item.title: Need help 317

item.description:
@beast_k0 wrote:

your asking us to build a server for you, there are plenty of server’s that already have all this. just look in the Server Download section.

Read full topic
